title: Gitea API.
description: This documentation describes the Gitea API.

SudoHeader.label: Sudo (SudoHeader)
SudoHeader.note: Sudo API request as the user provided as the key. Admin privileges are required.

SudoParam.label: sudo (SudoParam)
SudoParam.note: Sudo API request as the user provided as the key. Admin privileges are required.

adminCreatePublicKey.title: Add a public key on behalf of a user

adminCreateRepo.title: Create a repository on behalf a user

renderMarkdown.title: Render a markdown document as HTML

createOrgRepo.title: Create a repository in an organization

orgDeleteMember.title: Remove a member from an organization

orgIsMember.title: Check if a user is a member of an organization

orgIsPublicMember.title: Check if a user is a public member of an organization

repoGetArchive.title: Get an archive of a repository

repoGetBranch.title: Retrieve a specific branch from a repository

repoDeleteCollaborator.title: Delete a collaborator from a repository

repoCheckCollaborator.title: Check if a user is a collaborator of a repository

repoAddCollaborator.title: Add a collaborator to a repository

repoGetCombinedStatusByRef.title: Get a commit's combined status, by branch/tag/commit reference

repoGetEditorConfig.title: Get the EditorConfig definitions of a file in a repository

repoGetSingleCommit.title: Get a single commit from a repository

repoListAllGitRefs.title: Get specified ref or filtered repository's refs

repoListGitRefs.title: Get specified ref or filtered repository's refs

GetTree.title: Gets the tree of a repository.

repoListHooks.title: List the hooks in a repository

repoDeleteHook.title: Delete a hook in a repository

repoEditHook.title: Edit a hook in a repository

issueCreateIssue.title: Create an issue. If using deadline only the date will be taken into account, and time of day ignored.

issueGetRepoComments.title: List all comments in a repository

issueAddTime.title: Add a tracked time to a issue

issueEditIssue.title: Edit an issue. If using deadline only the date will be taken into account, and time of day ignored.

issueGetComments.title: List all comments on an issue

issueCreateComment.title: Add a comment to an issue

issueEditIssueDeadline.title: Set an issue deadline. If set to null, the deadline is deleted. If using deadline only the date will be taken into account, and time of day ignored.

issueClearLabels.title: Remove all labels from an issue

issueAddLabel.title: Add a label to an issue

issueRemoveLabel.title: Remove a label from an issue

repoCreateKey.title: Add a key to a repository

repoDeleteKey.title: Delete a key from a repository

repoGetKey.title: Get a repository's key by id

issueListLabels.title: Get all of a repository's labels

issueGetMilestonesList.title: Get all of a repository's opened milestones

repoPullRequestIsMerged.title: Check if a pull request has been merged

repoGetRawFile.title: Get a file from a repository

userCurrentCheckSubscription.title: Check if the current user is watching a repo

userTrackedTimes.title: List a user's tracked times in a repo

orgListTeamMember.title: List a particular member of team

orgRemoveTeamRepository.title: Remove a repository from a team
orgRemoveTeamRepository.description: This does not delete the repository, it only removes the repository from the team.

orgAddTeamRepository.title: Add a repository to a team

userListEmails.title: List the authenticated user's email addresses

userCurrentListFollowing.title: List the users that the authenticated user is following

userCurrentCheckFollowing.title: Check whether a user is followed by the authenticated user

userCurrentListGPGKeys.title: List the authenticated user's GPG keys

userCurrentListKeys.title: List the authenticated user's public keys

userCurrentListRepos.title: List the repos that the authenticated user owns or has access to

userCurrentListStarred.title: The repos that the authenticated user has starred

userCurrentCheckStarring.title: Whether the authenticated is starring the repo

userCurrentListSubscriptions.title: List repositories watched by the authenticated user

userListTeams.title: List all the teams a user belongs to

userCurrentTrackedTimes.title: List the current user's tracked times

userCheckFollowing.title: Check if one user is following another user

userListFollowing.title: List the users that the given user is following

userListGPGKeys.title: List the given user's GPG keys

userListKeys.title: List the given user's public keys

userListRepos.title: List the repos owned by the given user

userListStarred.title: The repos that the given user has starred

userListSubscriptions.title: List the repositories watched by a user

userGetTokens.title: List the authenticated user's access tokens

getVersion.title: Returns the version of the Gitea application
